item.title: Home
item.description: I’m Chris Gibbons An experienced frontend developer based in Lancashire [53.7632° N, 2.7044° W], UK. I build fast, user friendly and accessible websites for the automotive industry, with a particular passion/obsession for well written & clean code. I’ve got over a decades experience as a front end developer and have recently found a passion for UX and accessibility. My career has been spent working for some of the top businesses—both agency and in-house—in Manchester.
